meanings.sent1: She told a fib about eating all the cookies.
meanings.sent2: It's not nice to tell fibs to your friends.
meanings.sent3: The fib about the missing homework made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His fib about being a secret agent was quickly exposed.
meanings.sent5: The fib spread like wildfire through the school.

meanings.definition: To tell a small lie or untruth
meanings.sent1: He didn't want to fib, but he didn't want to hurt her feelings.
meanings.sent2: Kids sometimes fib to avoid getting in trouble.
meanings.sent3: She decided to fib about her age to get into the movie.
meanings.sent4: The politician continued to fib about his involvement in the scandal.
meanings.sent5: Fibbing only leads to more trouble in the end.
